programme.desc: Doctor Who: Day of the Daleks, S01E02, As captive of the guerrillas, the Doctor discovers they intend to change history. Jo is transported to the 22nd Century where she unwittingly gives vital information to the Daleks.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Day of the Daleks, S01E03, The Doctor arrives in a bleak future where Earth is ruled by the Daleks and mankind is enslaved. Rescuing Jo, the two escape but the brutish Ogrons are in pursuit.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Day of the Daleks, S01E04, The Controller betrays the Daleks and is exterminated. The Daleks travel back in time to the 20th Century to ensure that the peace conference fails.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E01, In Shoreditch, 1963, the Doctors past begins to catch up with him at the Totters Lane junkyard where his adventures began - and to where an old terror is returning.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series, Science fiction

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E02, Renegade Daleks battle Imperial Daleks for control of the Hand of Omega and Ace takes them on single-handedly at Coal Hill School, while Ratcliffe makes his move.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series, Science fiction

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E03, The Doctor discovers the difference between the two Dalek factions and why they want a stellar manipulator. He hopes Captain Gilmore's people are up to the task ahead.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series, Science fiction

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E04, The streets of East London shake under a civil war bering fought between the Daleks, as the Doctor forces the Dalek Emperor to reveal himself to be Davros, waging one last battle.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series, Science fiction

programme.title: The Executioners
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E01, Ian and Vicki are trapped by tentacled creatures on the planet Aridius. The Doctor and Barbara witness Daleks leaving Skaro on a mission to eliminate the Doctor and his companions.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series, Science fiction

programme.title: The Death of Time
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E02, The Doctor and his friends have been given shelter from the Daleks by the Aridians. But the Daleks threaten to kill the Aridians unless they hand over the time travellers.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series, Science fiction

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Murder by Moonlight
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E09, Easter Sunday of 1992, the body of missing woman Lisa Ziegert is found in a field. The investigation yields hundreds of leads but no true suspect. After more than two decades on ice, the case is revived.

programme.title: Sisters In Death
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E17, March 1984. Jack Kennedy discovers his daughters brutally murdered. Their mother and niece spend their lives keeping the case alive. DNA leads nowhere. 30 years later, an informant gives up a name.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E02, This is the story of the hunt for one of the most notorious serial killers in American history--the BTK killer. After committing at least seven brutal murders he vanished for over 25 years before sending clues of his crimes to the media in 2004.

programme.title: Diary Of A Serial Arsonist/The Lost Clue
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E10, A highly-regarded California arson investigator is suspected of setting a series of fires, and in Texas, a man is convicted of raping and murdering his 68-year-old neighbor.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E24, Guns found dumped in a pond help police to solve the 15-year-old murder of Detroit cab company owner. And the rape and murder of an Atlanta TV station receptionist goes cold for 20 years before DNA links a man to the crime.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: The Burning Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E12, A detective keeps a murder investigation going for 16 years and finally proves a woman killed her husband in a satanic rite; THE BURNING SECRET: and a rape victim fails to get a conviction on her attacker.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5011, Nine years after the murders of a mother and her teenage daughters, a wiretapped conversation helps police to crack the case. And the baffling murder of a Virginia woman is solved when human bones are discovered by a geologist in North Carolina.

programme.title: Eyes of a Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E13, On February 2, 2010, two masked gunmen commit a violent robbery and shoot Michael Temple Jr., rendering him a quadriplegic for five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: She Never Came Home
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E03, The case of a gruesome stabbing death of a bullied teenager remains unsolved for 27 years.

programme.title: Hitchhike To Murder / In The Care Of A Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E15, Police must wait nearly 30 years before advances in DNA technology give them the chance to convict the killer of a young hitchhiker, and Philadelphia police wage a 16-year hunt for the man who raped and killed a 10-year-old girl.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E22, The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E20, A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E02, With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E03, When a church deacon is found shot to death it looks like police may have stumbled upon a multi-party murder plot. And, a wife remains a key suspect in her husband's murder case for six years, until she attempts to prove her own innocence.

programme.title: Samson vs. The Vampire Women
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Samson vs. The Vampire Women, S06E25, While Mike and the Bots wrestle with Santo Versus the Vampire Women, TV's Frank is assumed into Second Banana Heaven, leaving no one for Dr. Forrester to kill.

programme.title: The Slime People
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Slime People, S01E09, The crew puts Commando Cody on trial for crimes against reality after watching the sixth episode of Radar Men while slime monsters invade Los Angeles in The Slime People.

programme.title: Jungle Goddess
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Jungle Goddess, S02E03, An heiress stranded in Africa is made queen of the jungle in the feature film and Bela Lugosi stars in the short The Phantom Creeps. Joel and the Bots create their own infomercial.

programme.title: Hercules And The Captive Women
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules And The Captive Women, S04E12, The guys face off against Hercules once again as the strong man fights evil Queen Antinea to get his son back in Hercules and the Captive Women.

MST3K: Viking Women And The Sea Serpent, 19911026000000 +0000, The crew watches an educational short about the wonders a home economics major can do for young women in The Home Economics Story (1951). In The Saga of the Viking Women Sea Serpent (1957), lonely Viking women set sail to rescue a group of enslaved men.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Keeping Clean And Neat
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E21, Don't leave the house before watching this indispensable guide to hygiene.
MST3K: The Undead, 19970308000000 +0000, A woman gets hypnotized back into her Dark Age'd past life while Tom takes a crack at being an observer.
MST3K: Pod People, 19910615000000 +0000, A child adopts a large egg which hatches into a mischievous alien, while a group of pop musicians on a wilderness vacation runs into trouble.

MST3K: Stranded In Space, 19910629000000 +0000, The gang on the SoL have a gag-weapon war with the Mads and watch an unsuccessful TV pilot about an astronaut stuck on an Earth-like planet where ;perfect order; rules.

MST3K: Viking Women And The Sea Serpent, 19911026000000 +0000, The crew watches an educational short about the wonders a home economics major can do for young women in The Home Economics Story (1951). In The Saga of the Viking Women Sea Serpent (1957), lonely Viking women set sail to rescue a group of enslaved men.

programme.title: The Forever Tree Pt. 1
programme.desc: Good Witch, S05E01, Hallmark Original Series. On the eve of Cassie's wedding, Sam searches for the Forever Tree.

programme.title: The Forever Tree Pt. 2
programme.desc: Good Witch, S05E02, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie and Sam get married.

programme.title: The Honeymoon
programme.desc: Good Witch, S05E03, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie and Sam honeymoon in the vineyard.

programme.title: The Prince
programme.desc: Good Witch, S05E04, Hallmark Original Series. A Prince comes to Middleton.

programme.title: The Tea
programme.desc: Good Witch, S05E05, Hallmark Original Series. Martha is reinstated.

programme.title: The Road Trip
programme.desc: Good Witch, S05E06, Hallmark Original Series. The Merriwicks road trip to Cassie's alma mater.

programme.title: The Grey-cation
programme.desc: Good Witch, S05E07, Hallmark Original Series. Martha and Tom stay at Grey House.

Mitch Albom's Have a Little Faith, 20111204000000 +0000, The story follows the spiritual journeys of three men: a suburban rabbi, an inner-city pastor, and an author. Stars Bradley Whitford, Laurence Fishburne, and Martin Landau. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

Face To Face, 19900124000000 +0000, In the tradition of "The African Queen", ornery adversaries whose differences begin to crumble amidst the breathtaking beauty of the African wilderness. Stars Elizabeth Montgomery and Robert Foxworth.

programme.title: Day After Day
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E03, Hallmark Original Series. Two guests arrive at Grey House and are immediately at odds.

programme.title: How to Say 'I Love You!'
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E04, Hallmark Original Series. The town is caught up in romance when Cassie helps Ben find an old film.

programme.title: A Birthday Wish
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E05, Hallmark Original Series. When a visiting chef is unable to relax, Cassie arranges for a day at the stove.

programme.title: Say It with Candy
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E06, Hallmark Original Series. Abigail, jealous of Cassie's attention, decides to sell "special" chocolates.

programme.title: In Sickness and in Health
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E07, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie gives a withdrawn traveling artist a new paintbrush.

programme.title: Somewhat Surprising
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E08, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie decides to plan a surprise party for Sam.

programme.title: Revisions
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E05, Six thousand light-years away, O'Neill and the SG-1 team discover a devastated universe where the inhabitants must live in a protective dome. They survive through an all-controlling computer system called the Link. But is it a savior, or a curse?

programme.title: Lifeboat
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E06, SG-1 finds a crashed spaceship containing hundreds of people in a cryogenic sleep. Stunned by an unseen weapon, the team is struck unconscious and, upon awakening, discovers that several of the frozen personalities now inhabit Daniel's body!

programme.title: Enemy Mine
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E07, An SGC Naquadah mining operation is attacked by a native tribe of Unas. SG-1 is sent to protect the miners and discovers that the Unas are guarding land they believe is sacred. Instead of eradicating the Unas, Daniel races to negotiate with them.

programme.title: Space Race
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E08, The Serakkin Warrick proposes to share his planet's technology with Earth in exchange for Carter helping him win a space race. Carter eagerly agrees and copilots the craft through a perilous obstacle course; but the race isn't without risks.

programme.title: Avenger 2.0
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E09, Dr. Felger creates a computer virus meant to disable Goa'uld-controlled worlds. When the program malfunctions and spreads throughout the Stargate network, O'Neill, Teal'c and Daniel are trapped off-world, with danger looming around the corner.

programme.title: Birthright
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E10, SG-1 encounters a race of women warriors whose survival depends on symbiotes harvested from Jaffa. Teal'c and SG-1 must convince the warriors' high priestess to put aside her fear of reliance on a life-saving drug before the Goa'uld destroy them.

programme.title: Evolution (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E11, SG-1 encounters a very advanced bio-engineered warrior endowed with super strength, created by Anubis. While the team sets out to locate the origin of this new foe, Daniel travels to South America in search of a device left on Earth by the Ancients.

programme.title: Evolution (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E12, Having found the location of the warrior base, Carter is assigned a recon mission to determine Anubis's plans. Meanwhile, O'Neill mounts a mission to South America to rescue Daniel who has been kidnapped by Honduran rebels demanding a ransom.

programme.title: Grace
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E13, Having sustained an injury during an alien attack, Carter awakens to find herself abandoned on the Prometheus and trapped. With only her subconscious as a guide, Carter must find a way out of the nebula before it destroys the ship and her way home.

programme.title: Fallout
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E14, Jonas Quinn returns to the SGC with news that Naquadria mines of Kelowna are not native to his world and are threatening to cause an explosion in the planet's core that will leave his home world uninhabitable and millions dead.

programme.title: The Kindred (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E18, Teyla, more determined than ever to find the missing Athosians, convinces Sheppard to travel with her to a trading settlement in search for answers. What they find there leads them to startling discovery that no one could have anticipated.

programme.title: The Kindred (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E19, After an unforeseen return, Dr. Carson Beckett shares that he has been held captive. As Teyla is re-united with some missing fellow Athosians, she begins to formulate a plan to ensure their escape, if she is able to find them in time.

programme.title: The Last Man
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E20, Disheartened by another unsuccessful search for Teyla, Lt. Colonel Sheppard returns to Atlantis and senses that something is not rightthe city has been abandoned. Now, McKay sets out on a risky plan to reverse a future that went horribly wrong.

programme.title: Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E01, As Sheppard and Ronon are trapped beneath a collapsed compound, McKay and Lorne are trapped in another pocket of debris. Michaels flagship Wraith Cruiser hurtles towards the compound, while Carter leads a rescue mission. Who will reach them first?

programme.title: The Seed
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E02, When Dr. Keller fails to report for her shift, concerned team members are shocked to discover her unconscious in her quarters. With the situation on Atlantis escalating, Woolsey is ultimately faced with a decision that could cost Keller her life.

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E03, During an off-world mission, Ronon (Jason Momoa) is ambushed and captured by his former friend, Tyre (Mark Dacascos), and turned over to the Wraith. As the team scrambles for leads to locate their friend, Ronon undergoes a torturous ordeal.

programme.title: The Daedalus Variations
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E04, A drive malfunction aboard a mysterious duplicate Daedalus sends the team jumping through various alternate realities where they encounter sinister alien life forms, a searing sun, and a pitched space battle over Atlantis.

programme.title: Commencement Part 1 and 2
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E029, As graduation approaches, the teens of West Beverly make their final decisions about the future while reminiscing about the past.

programme.title: So Long, Auf Wiedersehen
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E001, The gang kicks off college with a huge party. Brenda is uncertain about her decision. Andrea learns hurtful information about Gil.

programme.title: The Girl From New York City
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E002, Brandon's new girlfriend has intimacy issues and Brenda has trouble at school.

programme.title: The Little Fish
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E003, Brenda arrives back in Beverly Hills in the middle of the night and Steve's scheming ways almost backfire as the gang decides which classes to take.

programme.title: Greek To Me
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E004, It is rush week on campus. Now on the staff of the campus radio station, David and Donna man the graveyard shift.

programme.title: Radio Daze
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E005, Dylan finds Kelly with another guy. Donna is offered a daytime slot at the radio station, which causes problems with David. Andrea plans a date with her English teacher.

programme.title: Strangers in the Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E006, Kelly recommends that she and Dylan see other people. Mr. Walsh sets Brenda up on a blind date with his client's son.

programme.title: Moving Targets
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E007, Andrea takes initiative in her relationship with Dan. David and Kelly take sides in a fight between their parents.

programme.title: Twenty Years Ago Today
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E008, Brenda's relationship with Stuart causes a stir at the Walsh's twentieth-anniversary party. Brandon catches Dylan off guard with unexpected results.

programme.title: Otherwise Engaged
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E009, Brenda and Stuart argue about the details of their marriage. Lucinda has unsettling news for Brandon.

programme.title: And I Did It...My Way
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E010, The gang follows Brenda and Stuart to Las Vegas in hopes of stopping the wedding.

programme.title: Take Back the Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E011, Laura threatens to label Steve as a date rapist at a campus rally. He loses Celeste when he confesses his indiscretion.

programme.title: Radar Love
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E012, Brandon takes an unexpected road trip and Dylan accepts a Thanksgiving dinner invitation at the Walsh's after declining an invitation from Kelly.

programme.title: Emily
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E013, Brandon encourages Emily to pursue her dreams and Steve is caught stealing.

programme.title: Windstruck
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E014, Donna and David celebrate their first year together. Dylan and Kelly get back together, while Andrea falls in love with a new boyfriend.

programme.title: Somewhere in the World It's Christmas
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E015, The Walshes trip to Hawai'i doesn't go as planned when their plane is turned around due to technical problems.

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E02, A dramatic plane crash finds Hobie and his mother trapped in the rapidly flooding fuselage beneath the sea while Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards mount a massive rescue effort to save the trapped passengers and crew.

programme.title: Lover's Cove
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E03, Romance is in the air at Baywatch as Mitch and Jackie's friendship grows more intense, Summer and Matt begin a relationship, and Hobie falls in love with Lauren, a junior lifeguard with a devastating secret.

programme.title: Blindside
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E04, John D. Cort, Mitch's friend and a former lifeguard, returns to Baywatch where his life undergoes a devastating change. Meanwhile, Hobie meets a very "unique" new friend.

programme.title: Skyrider
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E05, Summer has love problems when Slade returns from a world surfing tour to discover Matt and Summer are dating. CJ is persistently pursued by a bungee jumping balloonist. Meanwhile, Garner patrols the beach on horseback.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E06, A prison break gone awry finds Mitch held hostage by a beautiful woman and forced to perform surgery on her escaped convict husband. Meanwhile, Matt and Slade decide to settle their mutual affection for Summer in a daring surfing contest.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E07, Mitch removes a bullet from an escaped convict, only to realize that he and his wife have every intention of killing him. Stephanie's sister Caroline arrives with her fianc, who becomes the target of an attempted murder.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E08, Mitch saves two boys from drowning. But when one ends up in a coma, Mitch suffers from PTSD and is left reevaluating his life as a lifeguard.

programme.title: Ironman Buchannon
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E09, Mitch's impending birthday prompts him to train for an ironman competition, getting swept off his feet by a younger woman along the way. Matt takes a night job to save money for a motorcycle, jeopardizing his coworkers through his exhaustion.

programme.title: Tower of Power
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E10, A new lifeguard helps Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards confront an upsurge in gang activity, and CJ is enamored with a beach magician who nearly drowns during a bungled underwater stunt.

programme.title: The Child Inside
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E11, The Baywatch lifeguards stage a beach-oriented Special Olympics, becoming involved with two young physically-challenged athletes whose parents have abandoned them.

programme.title: Second Time Around
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E12, Jesse Majors, the beautiful motorcycle racer that Matt fell in love with, returns, putting strain on Matt and Summers relationship.

programme.title: The Red Knights
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E13, An ad hoc reunion of elite 1950s lifeguards, the "Red Knights," triggers a bar brawl and Ben's resignation. Meanwhile, Mitch helps deliver a baby when the mother goes into premature labor while swimming at the beach.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E14, The Baywatch lifeguards travel to San Diego for a week where Summer is haunted by the hotel's legendary ghost. CJ grows attached to an orphaned dolphin at Sea World. And Mitch is stranded at sea with his brother when their sailboat capsizes.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E15, Adrift in the ocean with his semi-conscious brother, Mitch struggles to keep himself and Buzzy alive through the long, cold night. CJ unites an orphaned dolphin with its injured mother, and Summer becomes obsessed with a passionate ghost.

programme.title: Mirror, Mirror
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E16, A beautiful woman and her plain sister compete for Mitch's affection with perilous results. Matt confronts the sudden onset of a paralyzing fear of sharks, that may in reality be a far different fear.

programme.title: The Falcon Manifesto
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E17, An investigative reporter is working on a story which details the sale of U.S. military technology by businessman Edward Falcon. The story is so incriminating that her life is put at risk. Can the Baywatch team help her get out alive?

programme.title: Western Exposure
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E18, Country and Western superstar Jessie Lee Harris takes a detour from his concert schedule and pays a visit to Baywatch in search of his estranged wife and son
